name: Space Princess
description:
The game

Princess is the princess of the whole galaxy. Help her to cross hyperspace and avoid the super annoying space rats! More you keep moving and avoiding space rats, more points you get!

Space Rat

Keep an eye for milk bottles, you can store up to 3 and drinking one of it will grant you the power of invulnerability for a few seconds, after all milk is vey good for the bones.

Milk bottle

Regular Space Rats just keep moving forward, but beware for the Sniper Rat, this nasty enemy will follow your movements and shoot a very unpleasant water gun.

Sniper Rat

Space Princess is a very simple game made using RGDBS just out of curiosity of retro game development. 

Controls ControlGame BoyKeyboardMovementDirectionalsDirectional keys or WASDSpeed boostKeep pressing BKeep pressing K or XUse milk (invulnerability)AZ or JPauseStartEnter The real Princess Next Steps

I'm planning in release a physical copy just for fun,  so any comments or suggestions are much welcome to improve the game before the physical release. Also i intend to publish a series of articles about the development process.
